New Records: Memphis Grizzlies set a new record with 24 points from Jazz turnovers converted into points
Ja Morant recorded a career-high 22 points, 10 assists, and five rebounds
Key Match Events: Desmond Bane hit a key 3-pointer with six minutes left in the fourth quarter to help Memphis reestablish a five-point lead
Walker Kessler tied the game with a tip-in with under three minutes left
Ja Morant and Marcus Smart made key layups in the waning moments to secure the win
Pre-Game Insights: The Grizzlies entered the game with a strong record and high expectations
The Jazz were coming off a tough loss and looked to bounce back
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant praised the team's resilience and effort after the comeback win
The game marked a crucial early-season victory for both teams
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Utah's home arena, Salt Lake City
The Grizzlies and Jazz have a significant historical rivalry
